=======
summary
=======

This page gives an overview of all public ``discrimintools`` summary functions.

   eval_predict
   summaryCANDISC
   summaryCPLS
   summaryDA
   summaryDiCA
   summaryDISCRIM
   summaryGFA
   summaryGFALDA
   summaryMDA

   summarySTEPDISC
